translation: a formal discussion on a particular topic in a public meeting or legislative assembly
example: El debate comenzó con una fuerte crítica al sistema político.
exampleTranslation: The debate began with a strong critique of the political system.

translation: a speaker, especially one who delivers a formal address
example: Cada orador tuvo cinco minutos para presentar su punto de vista.
exampleTranslation: Each speaker had five minutes to present their point of view.

translation: a person who presides over a debate or discussion to ensure it proceeds smoothly
example: El moderador controlaba el tiempo y mantenía el orden.
exampleTranslation: The moderator controlled the time and kept order.

translation: facts; pieces of information that can be proven to be true
example: Los argumentos deben estar basados en hechos verificables.
exampleTranslation: Arguments must be based on verifiable facts.

translation: tournament; a series of contests or competitions
example: Madrid acoge muchos torneos estudiantiles cada año.
exampleTranslation: Madrid hosts many student tournaments each year.

translation: topic or subject of a debate or discussion
example: Un buen debate siempre tiene un tema claro.
exampleTranslation: A good debate always has a clear topic.

translation: refutation; the act of disproving or arguing against a statement or opinion
example: El equipo presentó una excelente refutación a los argumentos contrarios.
exampleTranslation: The team presented an excellent refutation to the opposing arguments.

translation: judges; individuals who assess the performance and decide the winner
example: Los jueces escucharon con atención antes de emitir su veredicto.
exampleTranslation: The judges listened carefully before delivering their verdict.

translation: opinion; a belief or view held about something
example: La opinión fue tan fuerte que dividió al público.
exampleTranslation: The opinion was so strong it divided the audience.

translation: university; an institution of higher education
example: Los debates en Madrid suelen celebrarse en la Universidad Complutense.
exampleTranslation: Debates in Madrid are often held at the Complutense University.
